axis2.name: #{adherenceSchedules} #{start}
axis2.text:
CASE 
WHEN KPI("Difference Planned Actual Start") > (<%=toleranceBeforeStart%>+0) THEN 'too early' 
WHEN KPI("Difference Planned Actual Start") < (<%=toleranceAfterStart%>+0)*(-1) THEN 'too late' 
ELSE 'on time'
END

axis2.name: #{adherenceSchedules} #{finish}
axis2.text:
CASE 
WHEN KPI("Difference Planned Actual Finish") > (<%=toleranceBeforeEnd%>+0) THEN 'too early' 
WHEN KPI("Difference Planned Actual Finish") < (<%=toleranceAfterEnd%>+0)*(-1) THEN 'too late' 
ELSE 'on time'
END

variables.name: differencePlannedActualFinish
variables.value:
REMAP_TIMESTAMPS(PU_LAST("AFPO", "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%=language%>" = 'Scheduled finish time'),DAYS)-
REMAP_TIMESTAMPS(PU_LAST("AFPO", "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", "_CEL_PP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%=language%>" = 'Actual finish time'),DAYS)

formula.text:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT")=1 THEN "AUFK"."PRCTR" 
ELSE "AUFK"."PRCTR" || ' - ' || "AUFK"."PRCTR_TEXT" 
END

formula.text:
CASE 
    WHEN ISNULL("AFPO"."XLOEK") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "AFPO"."XLOEK" = 'X' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "AFPO"."XLOEK"
END
